author: John Ficenec
title: Apple's share correction wipes out more value than the Croatian economy
text: Apple's share correction wipes out more value than the Croatian economy The slump in Apple's shares has wiped out $123bn in value in just two weeks Why are investors rushing to dump Apple shares? Photo: Alamy
